etymology.value: From Middle High German *niuwe*, from Old High German *niuwī*, from Proto-Germanic *niujaz*, from Proto-Indo-European *néwos*. Cognate with English *new*.

usage_notes.explanation: In German, adjectives change their endings depending on their grammatical context (case, gender, number). The table above shows the different forms of *neu*.

readability_explanation.text: *Neu* is a basic German adjective meaning *new*. It's one of the first words you'll learn when studying German. Remember to pay attention to adjective endings in German, as they change depending on the grammatical context.
